columns.author_id: The unique identifier for each author.
columns.name: The full name of the author.
columns.email: The email address of the author.

Author.table_description: The Author table stores information about individual authors.

columns.paper_id: The unique identifier for each paper.
columns.author_id: The unique identifier for each author.
columns.affiliation_id: The identifier for the author's affiliation.

Author_list.table_description: The Author_list table links authors to their respective papers and affiliations.

columns.paper_id: The unique identifier for each cited paper.
columns.cited_paper_id: The unique identifier for each paper that is cited.

Citation.table_description: The Citation table tracks citations between papers.

columns.affiliation_id: The unique identifier for each affiliation.
columns.name: The name of the organization or institution.
columns.address: The physical address of the affiliation.

Affiliation.table_description: The Affiliation table stores information about various organizations and their locations.

columns.paper_id: The unique identifier for each paper.
columns.title: The title of the paper.
columns.venue: The conference or journal where the paper was published.
columns.year: The publication year of the paper.

Paper.table_description: The Paper table stores details about published research papers.
